name: Comics and Zines Club
description: The Comics and Zines club has been at Whitney Young for two years providing a place to chill out from a long day of school and create something. This club focuses on zines as well as mainstream comics and any type of sequential art. Zines and comics are a wonderful way to express oneself promote ideas and showcase any number of talents.

announcements.title: Meetings
announcements.description: Club meetings take place Mondays at 3:30 in Room 178.
